column3: Excited to see everything. The parade ,the bingo,the vendor s the volunteer firefighter supper and Kiwanis breakfast helacopter rides

I get a quick getaway for the 4th july and I went to the brooklyn side and was awesome! Breathtaking with the manhatan view. Is was like an othe late.. We have to wait all day to get a good spot.. And at the end rain and everybody move.
This is not like Sydneys new years eve but I enjoyed! Go there in time and walk if possible. Traffic is heavy before and after.
